title: PHP__toString()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHP__toString()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Return the string content of the <note> element:
<?php
$xml = new SimpleXMLElement("<note>Hello <to>Tove</to><from>Jani</from>World!</note>");
echo $xml;
?>
Run Example »
Definition and Usage
The __toString() function returns the string content of an element.
This function returns the string content that is directly in the element - 
not the string content that is inside this element's children!
Syntax
SimpleXMLElement::__toString()
Technical Details
Return Value:
The string content on success. An empty string on 
 failure
PHP Version:
5.3+

★
+1
